name: Pack Attack (Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1)
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. 

Play as a wolf and hunt your prey to advance to the new level. The more wolves in your pack, the stronger prey you can hunt.

Use WASD to walk. Run into wolves to increase your pack size. Run into enemies to eat them. Eat all enemies to win the level.

Rabbit require one or more wolves. Deer require 2 wolves or more. Boars require 3 wolves or more. Bears require 4 wolves. 

Music/Sounds: freesound.org

Art: opengameart.org, itch.io

Coding/Game Design: coreylr197

Art/Sound Editing: coreylr197
